sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container>
    <v-row justify="end">
      <v-col cols="12" md="4">
        <v-card>
          <v-card-title>Nova Tarefa</v-card-title>
          <v-card-text>
            <v-form @submit.prevent="submitTask">
              <v-text-field
                v-model="task.title"
                label="Título da Task"
                required
              ></v-text-field>
              <v-textarea
                v-model="task.description"
                label="Descrição"
                style="margin-top: 16px;" <!-- Estilo inline -->
                required
              ></v-textarea>
              <v-btn type="submit" color="primary" class="mt-4">Salvar</v-btn>
            </v-form>
          </v-card-text>
        </v-card>
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      task: {
        title: '',
        description: ''
      }
    };
  },
  methods: {
    submitTask() {
      this.$emit('add-task', this.task);
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>
/* Estilização adicional se necessário */
</style>
